name: simple Platformer (elio1)
description:
Controls

Move: A / D

Jump: Space

Shot: Left Mouse Button

You can wall jump up to 3 times, each wall jump will change the color of the cube's eyes to indicate how many jumps are left. Yellow: 2 left, orange: 1 and red 0.

If you happen to pick up a green coin you get to do an air-jump and you reset your wall jumps.

You can shot, but it doesn't have a lot uses atm, except in the last level when you have a destructible wall.

You also can pick up coins,  but they have no real uses for now.

Have fun!
